# Partial list (Pacific) of HotSpots from Table 1 of Yamaji, 1992
# Lon	Lat	Abbreviation	Hotspot_name
167	3	CRL	Caroline
230	46	COB	Cobb
205	20	HWI	Hawaii
221.9	-50.9	LSV	Louisville
220	-29	MDN	MacDonald
221	-11	MRQ	Marquesas
231	-27	PTC	Pitcairn
254	-27	SLG	Sala y Gomez
192	-15	SAM	Samoa
212	-18	SOC	Society
